Metadata.title: Placy Pro | AI Platform for Real Estate
Metadata.description: Transform your real estate business with Placy Pro's AI assistant. Automate lead management, property searches, and scheduling, offering 24/7 support in 50+ languages.

Hero.description: Equip your team with an AI that handles the heavy lifting: automating marketing campaigns, answering calls instantly, and guiding agents through every negotiation.

FeatureShowcase.heading: Capture Every Lead and Double Your Results

LocalizationSlider.heading: Enterprise-Grade Localization
LocalizationSlider.description: Local regulation compliance, dialect-specific training, and market-specific property data.

SuccessStories.heading: Success Stories
SuccessStories.testimonial1Text: We chose to work with Placy Pro to automate part of our work and leverage modern tools that enhance our efficiency. By adopting this new technology, we're among the first to benefit. Placy Pro helps us save time with a bot that makes our work better, faster, and more efficient. In the end, we provide better service to our clients while spending less time on tasks.
SuccessStories.testimonial2Text: As a young and modern company, we understand how important it is to use progressive technologies in our daily work and how this can improve our operational efficiency. This is precisely why the collaboration with Placy seemed so promising to us. The idea of an AI assistant is simple and brilliant — it doesn't get tired, it doesn't burn out, and it's always polite. Moreover, it works 24/7 and knows the answers to all questions, if it's created by a team of professionals, and the Placy is exactly that.

WhyUs.heading: Why us?
WhyUs.industrySub: Specialized in the Real Estate Sector
WhyUs.industryContent: Placy Pro was built from the ground up to serve real estate professionals — agents, brokers, and property managers. The platform offers out-of-the-box readiness for real estate tasks, eliminates costly customization, and keeps agents focused on closing deals.
WhyUs.geographicSub: Focused on EU and MENA Markets
WhyUs.geographicContent: Placy Pro supports localized regulations, languages, and market nuances in Europe and MENA. Faster deployment due to built-in localization and compliance checks, with multilingual interactions for buyers, sellers, and investors.
WhyUs.aiContent: Placy Pro employs more than one AI model, each specialized in different tasks — from rapid response for routine queries to deep analysis for investment potential or advanced translations.
WhyUs.integrationContent: Designed for seamless integration with real estate-specific tools — MLS databases, CRMs, property management systems — with customizable workflows for each agency's unique processes.
WhyUs.dataContent: Integrates government registries, verified transaction records, API from data providers, and off-market listings unavailable to general platforms.
WhyUs.featuresContent: Combines advanced semantic and multimodal search (text, voice, images, and video) with agentic frameworks that automate complex tasks like scheduling viewings and drafting agreements.
WhyUs.costContent: Delivers a more affordable AI solution compared to hiring custom developers or licensing generic AI tools. Reduced initial deployment costs and lower total cost of ownership.
WhyUs.supportContent: Ongoing, real estate-focused analytics and error-correction tools, along with dedicated post-deployment support. Quick and painless setup to continuous monitoring.

FAQ.heading: FAQ
FAQ.q1: Can I edit the assistant's responses or create custom replies?
FAQ.a1: Yes, you can fully customize the assistant's responses, create custom reply templates, and adjust its behavior for different scenarios. The platform provides an intuitive interface for managing response templates.
FAQ.q2: Can the assistant help with legal, financing, or contract-related questions?
FAQ.a2: The assistant can provide general information about common real estate processes, but it's designed to direct clients to qualified professionals for specific legal, financing, or contractual advice. You can configure it to share relevant resources and schedule consultations with your team.
FAQ.q3: Can we run multilingual conversations and phone calls out of the box?
FAQ.a3: Absolutely. Placy Pro supports 50+ languages out of the box for both text conversations and phone calls. The AI automatically detects the client's language and responds accordingly, with dialect-specific training for supported markets.
FAQ.q4: How does Placy Pro handle conflicting information across multiple sources?
FAQ.a4: Placy Pro uses a priority-based system to reconcile conflicting data. You can configure which sources take precedence, and the assistant will flag discrepancies for human review when confidence is low.
FAQ.q5: Can I send out proactive messages or follow-ups on WhatsApp using Placy Pro?
FAQ.a5: Yes, Placy Pro supports proactive outreach on WhatsApp, Telegram, and other messaging platforms. You can configure automated follow-up sequences, schedule messages, and personalize outreach based on lead attributes and behavior.
